mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (board_id, content, writer_id, parent_id) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{parentId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.board_id, r.content, r.likes_count, r.writer_id, m.nickname, r.reg_date, r.parent_id FROM reply r LEFT JOIN member m ON r.writer_id = m.id WHERE r.board_id = #{boardId} AND r.parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY r.reg_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT r.id, r.board_id, r.content, r.likes_count, r.writer_id, m.nickname, r.reg_date, r.parent_id FROM reply r LEFT JOIN member m ON r.writer_id = m.id WHERE r.parent_id = #{parentId}
